be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.database.dao.cloud

Interface CloudDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DropboxDao, GoogleDao

    public interface CloudDao
    This is the public interface to manipulate information with cloud services

      • checkIfProjectExist

        boolean checkIfProjectExist(User user,
                            java.lang.String projectName)
                     throws CloudException
        Check if a user have a project according to the name
        Parameters:
        user - the user
        projectName - the project name
        Returns:
        true if the user have a project on the cloud matching the project name, false otherwise
        Throws:
        CloudException - if an Exception is thrown
